description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Ice-Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut Butter Ice-Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn ice-cream out of pan onto a clean work surface. Using an 8cm round cutter cut out 6 rounds. Roll sides in grated chocolate to coat. Sandwich between 2 wafers. Return to freezer until ready to serve.
